replies.msg:
When dinosaur died, carbon in form of organic matters, such as carbs, proteins and lipids are stored inside the dead remaining.

After millions of years passed, soil layer were added to the dead bodies and the organic matters containing carbon in dead bodies that are not completed decomposed beforehand will be converted into fossil fuels by the great heat and pressure underground with the aid of bacteria.

The dinosaur carbon is now in form of fossil fuels underground and can be stored underground for millions of years.

In present days, human can extract the fossil fuels from underground and use them for daily applications such as fuels for generating electricity or burning in car engine.

During the process of fuel burning, the dinosaur carbon will be released as carbon dioxide gas that is a product of fuel combustion.

The carbon dioxide released into atmosphere can be fixed into the organic matter (mainly carbohydrates) of producers on earth again by photosynthesis.

Some dinosaurs carbon in form of organic biomass in producers will pass along the food web to different consumers and some stay inside the producers.

If Sharon consumes any of these organisms as food, the dinosaur carbon now in form of organic matter will be passed into her body after the consumption, digestion, absorption and assimilation process.

When the organic matter containing dinosaur carbon such as glucose is used in respiration by Sharon’s cells, the dinosaur carbon will become carbon dioxide again. The carbon dioxide is a metabolic waste and needs to be removed from Sharon’s body.

By the help of Sharon’s circulation system, the excess carbon dioxide from respiration will be transported to the lung and removed from the body by exhalation.

As a result, Sharon is able to breathe out the carbon that may be originated from dinosaurs in the form of carbon dioxide.

As a result, Sharon is able to breathe out the carbon that may be originated from dinosaurs in the form of carbon dioxide.

History of Phylogenetic Classification
Until the middle of the 20th century, biologists classified all living things as either a plant or an animal. But this system failed to accommodate fungi, protists and bacteria. So by the 1970s, the classification system evolved to what was known as Five Kingdoms — prokaryotes (bacteria) and eukaryotes (plants, animals, fungi, protists). Eukaryotes are characterized by the presence of nuclei, cytoskeletons, and internal membranes in their cells.

In the late 1970s, Dr. Carl Woese and his colleagues at the University of Illinois identified a group of microorganisms whose genetic makeup was vastly different from other bacteria. So they divided prokaryotic life into what they called archaeabacteria and eubacteria. However, they later concluded that "archaeabacteria" were sufficiently different as to not be bacteria at all. So the groups were renamed to archaea and bacteria.

https://www.diffen.com/difference/Archaea_vs_Bacteria#History_of_Phylogenetic_Classification

張五常 思考的方法（上）

第三，要斷定問題的重要性。在我所知的高手中，衡量問題的重要與否是慣例。赫舒拉發更喜歡把這衡量放在一切考慮之前。學生問他一個問題，他可能回答：「這問題不重要。」於是就想也不再想。認為是重要的問題呢，他就從座上站起來！

判斷問題的重要性並不太難。你要問：「假若這問題有了答案，我們會知道了些什麼？」若所知的與其他的知識沒有什麼關連，或所知的改變不了眾所周知的學問，問題就無足輕重了。

唔clinically relevant都係唔重要

我有甲亢已經3年，一直都好易 感冒發燒 同埋手震心臟唔舒服，我眼凸情況愈黎愈明顯，搞到個人情緒化無返工摺埋成年。

1月個時醫生就話我食左咁耐藥就 減到得一粒藥，我中間手震同 心跳加劇咗，就自行加藥先舒服番。
我食藥根本控制唔到我 病情

我試過辛苦入醫院拎藥叫醫生寫醫生信俾我入醫院做呢個手術
https://hk.lifestyle.appledaily.com/nextplus/magazine/article/20170429/2_505496_0/-動畫-壹醫醒你-兩個成人一個-大頸泡-直擊超聲波消融甲狀腺結節

瑪麗醫院於二○一五年引入亞洲首部高強度聚焦超聲波儀器，為病人消融甲狀腺增生組織，痕不留疤，毋須全身麻醉，最重要是可以保存甲狀腺功能。

我瑪麗個期去到2019年先見醫生，問題係我呢兩年係讀書考試，我唔可以有手震機會出現，唔係我會肥佬

我今日去左 覆診，個醫生唔知有呢項技術俾我個反應，佢俾左兩樣建議我
1.2019年入瑪麗做
2.用碘
佢話新手術同用碘都要 終身食藥，新手術都唔係一了百了。
安排左我另一個醫生評估下碘治療。
佢畀我嘅感覺應該係想我用碘多過新手術

我想問
1碘係咪可以 殺死 有問題嘅甲狀腺組織，重點係咪即刻停左眼凸情況同手震
2，邊個方法副作用大
3。有冇專科醫生推介

我問左個醫生佢話用左碘就唔可以再做手術
叫我返走諗清楚，佢好似唔清楚呢項新手術，所以我先上黎連登博下細機會問人，始終一用碘對女人身體好傷。

我剩係想快d停左手震眼問題
thx咁多位希望唔好有人搞亂個post


ps。最後決定係我，就算有咩事錯都係我責任，與人無關

2.用碘

replies.msg:
Yes, thyroid eye signs ma

Sorry my Chinese typing is too slow so I will just use English here
(Disclaimer: I'm just a clinical year medic student so please ask a real doctor for professional advice. This is an academic discussion only.)

1. Radioactive iodine (RAI) can indeed destroy the pathological thyroid tissue. However, it does not resolve the ophthalmopathy (the bulging eye). In fact it carries a risk of exacerbating ophthalmopathy but this can be prevented by steroid (prednisolone) usage.
Ophthalmopathy itself may be treated by high dose steroids, orbital radiotherapy or direct orbital decompression surgery. I have no idea about the details of these treatments though.
Hand tremor is most commonly treated by beta-blockers (classically propranolol), which also prevents / treats tachycardia and palpitations. Since it is due to thyroid hormone, tremor should resolve with RAI.

2. I have no idea about the new therapy so I cannot comment. I wonder how localized destruction of thyroid tissue can be used for Grave's disease treatment though, given that Grave's disease is marked by diffuse thyroid follicle hyperplasia and hypertrophy (sor a bit technical).

3. Not that I know of but maybe you can try try the professor private clinics? I'm from CUHK so I know that there's one at PWH (CUHK), but I'm not sure about QMH (HKU).

Hope this helps. Again, please seek real doctors for formal medical advice.

你份報告淨係寫甲亢+大頸泡 無寫係唔係grave's disease 不過你個case都好大機會係(graves disease係甲亢最普遍成因+女性比較大機會+你呀媽都有甲亢，有家族歷史）但係始終報告無確切寫係graves disease 我地旁觀者都唔可以話你一定係

字裡行間 絲打你應該有些少因為眼凸搞到你份人無咩自信 想盡快解決個問題

假設你係graves disease, 你話你咁耐病情好似無改善，但你應該有定期覆疹驗血比醫生去evaluate療效，佢無理由見到無療效仲要減你antithyroid drug既dosage ?

如果antithyroid drug真係無療效 你應該淨返手術/碘揀 去停止繼續眼凸既情況 上面medic巴打都講左眼凸要靠其他therapy 但係佢唔係醫生既first priority 所以唔知你有無同你醫生反映眼凸對你既心理影響呢?


https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT03013257
你話既新手術應該仲係pilot study緊 所以其他醫院就未必會有啦 都係得開刀手術/碘 但係你話排期要2019年 或者你可以試下直接contact瑪麗果邊 睇下會唔會快d 或者知下詳情都好

replies.msg:
關於新療法你就問下QM嗰個醫生啦，話曬佢發明佢先係最清楚。

懷孕同hyperthyroidism冇直接關係，停三年藥先可以懷孕既原因最主要係你依家食緊既藥可以經血液傳比BB，所以先要停藥，以免影響BB發育。而四季經其實都未必淨係關你既病事，壓力，情緒，體質，營養都會好影響經期，你要做既係改善下以上可以改變既因素，睇下經期有冇正常返。

最後就係依家食緊既藥既問題，介唔介意講下依家食緊咩藥?
